title.rendered: Smile celebrates Anti Child Labor Day with Fever FM Radio Station

content.rendered:
Lawyer, architect or a chef- Little children have the biggest dreams! Children from Smile Foundation took to the ‘airwaves’ on this Anti Child Labor Day through the studios of Fever FM Radio Station in Mumbai. Featuring on the morning Prime Time show ‘Mad Mornings with RJ Glenn and Ruchi’, the children were encouraged to pursue education as it opens the door to a dignified life. Discussion on different career options after completing education brought a wave of enthusiasm among the kids. RJ Glenn Live and Rangeeli Ruchi also explained them how a radio station functions. The excitement and curiosity of the children took everyone by surprise. Singing songs along with the radio, the positivity of these kids was infectious for the entire city!

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 750,000 children and their families every year, through more than 350 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 1000 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
